known_issues: In some UI layouts/screen sizes, the 'Download code'/'Export code' button may not be visible to the user.

existing_features.title: Add a downloadable ZIP artifact of the full project (frontend + backend) into the repository as a static file so users can download the code even when the platform UI “Download/Export code” button is not visible.

Expose the ZIP download via the landing page UI by adding a clearly labeled download link/button in the site footer, and include a short one-line instruction indicating that this is the full source code download.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide an alternative way to export/download the full landing page project as a ZIP delivered directly in chat (since the UI 'Download/Export code' button is not visible).

projectName: Provide an in-app downloadable ZIP of the full landing page project (alternative to missing Export button)
